items.ja: Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job
items.en: Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job
items.text_for_match:
Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job Speaking in his last press conference as Strasbourg manager, Liam Rosenior says taking the job at Chelsea is the right move for his career. 
The 41-year-old has spent the last 18-months at the Blues' sister club Strasbourg after he was sacked from Hull City in 2024. Speaking in his last press conference as Strasbourg manager, Liam Rosenior says taking the job at Chelsea is the right move for his career. 
The 41-year-old has spent the last 18-months at the Blues' sister club Strasbourg after he was sacked from Hull City in 2024.
